keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: United States prosecutors and a lawyer for a Qaeda operative are at odds over whether he actually intended to carry out an airport bombing near London.

headline.print_headline: Disagreement Over Qaeda Operative’s Intent in Bomb Plot Delays Sentencing
headline.main: Disagreement Over Man’s Intent in Bomb Plot Delays Sentencing

snippet: United States prosecutors and a lawyer for a Qaeda operative are at odds over whether he actually intended to carry out an airport bombing near London.
abstract: Federal Judge Alison J Nathan declines to sentence Al Qaeda operative Minh Quang Pham, who prepared to carry out bombing at London's Heathrow Airport, after United States prosecutors and his lawyer fail to agree on whether Pham, who was extradited to United States in 2015, actually intended to carry out bombing.
